channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #189 – Character animation using Spine and meshes

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Corona Geek After Dark is the first Wednesday of every month. We moved from Google Hangouts to using Zoom to improve recording quality and allow more than 10 panelist to join at one time. Zoom sessions are invite only. @ScottRules44, I will add you to the invite email list :-)
item.content:encoded: Corona Geek After Dark is the first Wednesday of every month. We moved from Google Hangouts to using Zoom to improve recording quality and allow more than 10 panelist to join at one time. Zoom sessions are invite only. @ScottRules44, I will add you to the invite email list ðŸ™‚
